sentences.sentence: Damselfish live in ocean waters throughout the world.
sentences.translation: 少女鱼生活在全世界的海水里。

sentences.sentence: Even after damselfish killed off parts of the staghorn colonies, the areas that remained were able to survive.
sentences.translation: 甚至少女鱼杀死鹿角珊瑚一部分群体后，剩余的部分仍然能存活。

sentences.sentence: In just 10 years, 33 new fish species have been discovered in the oceans surrounding the island, including the damselfish Chrysiptera cymatilis.
sentences.translation: 在短短10年的时间里，在该岛屿周围发现了33中新的鱼类，其中包括小热带鱼Chrysiptera cymatilis.这种醒目的蓝色小鱼是在米尔湾的水域中北发现的。
